oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sneezing to be avoided when game has been wounded. How to obviate the ill effect of a Sneeze. (L V.-21. 5654-5659). Mothers tell the children about how sneezing affects the death of game. Wounded game jumps up if the children sneeze.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sneezing: to be avoided when game is shot
